Our Theses

Specialization drives success

We make a small number of investments each year in areas we believe will change how the world works.

Our prediction: Artificial intelligence is about to give humanity a fighting chance to win the race against automation.

Our prediction: Deskless workforce applications are on the brink of radically transforming 80% of the global workforce.

Industry Cloud

Our prediction: The era of horizontal software companies is over. Vertically-focused companies represent an emerging approach to building cloud companies: focus on an industry and go deep to build lasting customer loyalty.
